author: muji24

review: This makes my 3rd one so far!  It's super easy to set up, easy to use, and does so much.  I can play Lullabies in the baby's room through my streaming music app, watch the Food Network shows, HBO shows with the HBO Go app, Netflix and more.  Each dongle can have its own name and I can shoot to any of them while sitting on the couch in the front room (you do need to use a separate APP for each dongle).  I did have to purchase a WiFi extender to get the signal to reach to my room, but I'm not sure if it's a Chromecast thing or a modem range thing.  The coolest part is that I can take my Chromecast with me anywhere, like a friend's house, and watch streaming movies there, as long as they have an HDMI port and wifi.  It's small, but mighty and I love it!
